00032 //
00033 // Routines to deal with shader parameter parsing easily.
00034 //
00035 
00036 #ifndef mrParameters_h
00037 #define mrParameters_h
00038 
00039 #include "mrMacros.h"
00040 
00041 BEGIN_NAMESPACE( mr )
00042 
00043 
00044 
00045 
00046 
00047 template< typename T >
00048 inline bool connected( const miState* const s, const T& p )
00049 {
00050    return (!(s)->shader->ghost_offs ? false :
00051            (!*((miTag*)((char*)(&p)+(s)->shader->ghost_offs)) ? false :
00052             true));
00053 }
00054 
00056 template< typename T >
00057 inline const T& eval( const miState* const state, const T& v )
00058 {
00059    return *( static_cast<T*>( mi_eval( const_cast<miState*>(state),
00060                                        (void*) &v ) ) );
00061 }
00062 
00064 template< typename T >
00065 inline const T* eval( const miState* const state, const T* v )
00066 {
00067    return static_cast<T*>( mi_eval( const_cast<miState*>(state),
00068                                     (void*) &v ) );
00069 }
00070 
00071 
00072 END_NAMESPACE( mr )
00073 
00074 #define mr_connected( f ) mr::connected(state, f)
00075 #define mr_eval( f ) mr::eval(state, f)
00076 
00077 #endif // mrParameters_h
